name: sqltools
description: Database management done right. Connection explorer, query runner, intellisense, bookmarks, query history. Feel like a database hero!
author: Matheus Teixeira <me@mteixeira.dev>

colors.description: Background decoration color for current query
Background decoration color for current query

commands.title: Format Selected Query For Any Document

sqltools.autoConnectTo.markdownDescription: Name(s) of the connection(s) to auto connect on start.

sqltools.disableChordKeybindings.markdownDescription: SQLTools' default chord keybindings begin with `Ctrl/Cmd+E` and therefore mask the default keybinding of VS Code's `Go to File...` command. When this setting is disabled (the default) you can instead invoke that command with the chord `Ctrl/Cmd+E Ctrl/Cmd+E`. Enable this setting if you don't require SQLTools' chord keybindings.

sqltools.historySize.description: Number of queries to keep in History.

sqltools.completionLanguages.markdownDescription:
Languages with SQL completion enabled.

You can use any language identifier, including those listed at https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/languages/identifiers.

sqltools.formatLanguages.markdownDescription:
Languages with SQL formatting enabled.

You can use any language identifier, including those listed at https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/languages/identifiers.

sqltools.codelensLanguages.markdownDescription:
Languages that SQLTools will add CodeLenses to.

You can use any language identifier, including those listed at https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/languages/identifiers.

More info about codelens, see https://vscode-sqltools.mteixeira.dev/features/codelens

sqltools.highlightQuery.markdownDescription: Highlight the query at the cursor position.

sqltools.queryParams.regex.description: RegEx used to identify query parameters.

socketPath.description: Path of socket file to connect using UNIX sockets. MySQL only for now.

askForPassword.description: Ask for password at connection time instead of storing it as plaintext in your settings.

driver.markdownDescription: Connection driver used for this connection.

dialect.deprecationMessage: ***DEPRECATED*** Replaced by `driver` property. Use `driver` property instead.

connectString.description: Connect string. Support for Oracle, PostgreSQL and AWS Redshift.

previewLimit.description: Maximum number of records to return in table previews.

icons.description: Define an icon for this connection. If not specified, use defaults.

sqltools.results.limit.description: Maximum number of records to return in results.

enumDescriptions: Every request creates a new tab.
There is a single tab for each connection.
New group if nothing open. Second group if currently active text editor is in first group. Otherwise third group.
sqltools.results.location.markdownDescription: Define which edit group the results tab should appear in. Empty groups are never created. For example, if setting is 4 but only one group currently exists then the first set of results will create a new group 2, the second a group 3 and the third and subsequent sets of results will appear in group 4.

sqltools.results.customization.description: Properties that customize the appearance of results tables.

sqltools.tableTreeItemsExpanded.description: Table columns should be expanded on load?

sqltools.defaultExportType.description: Default mode for results Export command.

sqltools.defaultOpenType.description: Default mode for results Open command.

sqltools.languageServerEnv.markdownDescription: Set environment variables to be passed to language server. For example `ORACLE_HOME`, `PATH`...

sqltools.flattenGroupsIfOne.description: Flatten groups that have only one child.

sqltools.autoOpenSessionFiles.description: Auto open session file when connecting.

sqltools.sessionFilesFolder.description: Folder for session files to be saved in.

packageManager.markdownDescription: Package manager name or path. For example `yarn`, `npm` or absolute paths like `/usr/bin/npm`.

installArgs.markdownDescription: Array of args passed when installing. If you use `yarn` this shoud be set to `["add"]`.

runScriptArgs.description: Array of args passed when runnning npm scripts.

autoAccept.description: Skip confirmation requests when installing or upgrading dependencies.

sqltools.connectionExplorer.groupConnect.description: Display connections in two groups, 'Connected' and 'Not Connected'.
